name: The Lure of Treasure Whisper Island
name_original: The Lure of Treasure Whisper Island
description:
Created in a 48 hour window for Ludum Dare #51

Listen to the voice, find the treasure ye seek
Warmer means closer, and hotter as ye near
Colder means farther, an icy wind is bleak
Lava means yer on it, but sunset ye shall fear

Controls:

WASD - Move
Left-click - Dig  (or E as an alternative for track-pads)
Spacebar - Jump
Escape - Return to Menu
